mods.note: This piece has a lithograph on the cover of a kneeling, finely dressed young woman with her hands folded as if in prayer. Inscribed on the cover is "Presented to NOra E. Gardner by Eliza Gooding, 'My Sorority,' Columbia, Sep. 1, 1861." There is no date of publication; however, the date of 1860 was inferred from another piece of sheet music in the same bound volume belonging to Miss Nora Gardner of Tennessee.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
